name: Christ in Glory
description: Christ in Glory; Correggio (Antonio Allegri) (Italian, about 1489 - 1534); Italy; 1520 - 1523; Red chalk and brown and gray wash, heightened with white bodycolor on pink ground; inscribed circle in brown ink; squared in red chalk; 14.6 × 14.6 cm (5 3/4 × 5 3/4 in.); 87.GB.90; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Christ in Glory
medium: Red chalk and brown and gray wash, heightened with white bodycolor on pink ground; inscribed circle in brown ink; squared in red chalk
